skills.name: void-sector
skills.title: Void Sector Lore Writer
skills.description: Create compelling sci-fi horror lore for Void Sector digital garden with full Quartz integration

commands.description: Main lore writing skill for Void Sector
Generate a new character profile with connections
Create a new Void Sector location with incident history
Develop a thematic concept or phenomenon
Write a corporate incident report with leaked truth
Create a personal log showing psychological deterioration
Find and suggest cross-links between documents
Identify and develop recurring patterns in lore
